recommended_degree: Manajemen Transportasi Laut, Manajemen Transportasi, Administrasi Logistik, Transportasi Laut, Manajemen Bisnis Internasional (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description: Prepare shipping documents, coordinating with carriers and freight forwarders, monitoring container and vessel schedules, and ensuring accurate data entry for export bookings. The role also includes supporting report preparation and daily administrative tasks related to Ocean Export operations.
